imdb.plot outline: ESPN invites six of the nation's top football recruits to spend their last week before college living in ESPNU's Summer House. The boys will compete for the title "King of the House" by participating in a series of challenges that test their mental toughness, teamwork, determination, and athleticism.
imdb.title: ESPNU Summer House
